articles.summary: Plans for Europe's largest cloud and artificial intelligence (AI) centre near the M25 in Hertfordshire have been approved. The UK launched its so-called 'action plan' in March.      .   i   in

articles.title: Trump Signs Executive Order Banning Woke AI
articles.author: Futurism
articles.summary: Donald Trump's administration is all-in on AI, but not the woke kind. He suggests in his latest executive orders that wokeness is, essentially, keeping AI down. To maintain leadership, AI systems must be free from ideological bias or engineered social agendas.

articles.title: AI 'godfather' Yoshua Bengio says AI agents could be the 'most dangerous path'
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Yoshua Bengio, an AI pioneer, is in Davos. Bengio is researching AI agents with the power of AGI could lead to "catastrophic scenarios". Eric Schmidt, former CEO and chairman of Google, is also there. He is also a researcher.

articles.title: Should India build its own AI foundation models?
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Stanford researchers coined the term foundation model to mean any AI model that is trained on broad data that can be adapted to a wide range of downstream tasks. For example, a large language foundation model powers ChatGPT to convert text to text. Other foundation models can be advanced computing chips and certain closed AI model weights.

articles.title: Meta guru urges Europe to gamble more on AI
articles.author: FABRICE COFFRINI
articles.summary: Europe should plough more money into artificial intelligence, according to Meta's chief AI scientist Yann LeCun. He also judged as "a little unrealistic" a $500 billion AI bazooka announced by US President Donald Trump this week. This page requires Javascript.

articles.title: Meta plans to invest $60 bn or more in AI this year
articles.author: Julia Demaree Nikhinson
articles.summary: Mark Zuckerberg announced on Friday that Meta will invest at least $60 billion in artificial intelligence in 2025, aiming to lead in the technology. "This will be a defining year for AI," Zuckerberg said in a post on his Facebook page. Javascript is required to read premium content.

articles.title: Navigating deepfakes and synthetic media: This course helps students demystify artificial intelligence technologies
articles.author: Mozhdeh Khodarahmi
articles.summary: Mozhdeh Khodarahmi, Macalester College, The Conversation, is offering a course on AI Literacy and Building Resilience to Misinformation. The aim of the course is to teach students how to make informed decisions in the digital age.
